ShowingFilterCount.description: The message displayed above the filter management panel showing the filtered item counts

CreateFilterError.message: An error occurred while creating filter: $ERROR$
CreateFilterError.description: The error message displayed if an error occurs while creating a new filter item.

RemoveFilterError.message: An error occurred while removing filter: $ERROR$
RemoveFilterError.description: The error message displayed if an error occurs while removing a filter item.

FilterMigrationComplete.description: The title message of the notification displayed to the user after attempting to migrate their filters to the new storage system.

FilterMigrationFailure.message: Unfortunately, an error occurred while migrating your old filters: $ERROR$
FilterMigrationFailure.description: The error message displayed if an error occurs while migrating filters.

FilterMigrationSuccess.message: $SUCCESS$ out of $TOTAL$ filters were migrated successfully; $DUPLICATE$ were duplicates, and $INVALID$ were invalid.
FilterMigrationSuccess.description: The message displayed when the filters were migrated successfully.

ErrorInvalidFilterItem.description: The error message displayed when creating a new filter item if the item is invalid.

ErrorDuplicateFilterItem.description: The error message displayed when creating a new filter item if the item is already filtered.

ErrorMissingFilterItem.description: The error message displayed when removing a filter item if the item is not already filtered.

FilterPropertyRequiredMessage.message: Please enter a value for this field.
FilterPropertyRequiredMessage.description: The error message displayed when creating a filter if a required property is not set.

FilterPropertyInvalidPatternMessage.description: The error message displayed when creating a filter if a property's values does not match the pattern.
